long_description: Designed for triathlons and time-trials, the Fizik Arione Tri 2 Saddle offers a stable, comfortable platform for your Race of Truth. Synthetic Microtex cover is durable, water resistant and washable, and it's lighter weight than leather. Nose of saddle features additional padding for increased comfort; grip dots at nose of saddle help keep you positioned when you're pedaling hard in an aero position. Wing Flex design enables outer edges of saddle to flex downward when the inner thigh contacts the saddle, helping increase comfort and pedaling efficiency. Nylon/carbon-reinforced shell provides lightweight support and comfort. K:ium alloy rails offer an excellent strength-to-weight ratio and comfort-enhancing vibration damping.
short_description: Designed for triathlons and time-trials, the Fizik Arione Tri 2 Saddle offers a stable, comfortable platform for your Race of Truth.
